com.gcell.ibeacon.gcellbeaconscanlibrary

Class GCellBleDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gcell.ibeacon.gcellbeaconscanlibrary.GCellBleDevice

  • public class GCellBleDevice
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Bluetooth Low Energy Device and its relevant data - e.g., whether it is an iBeacon, its RSSI, last time it was seen etc
